sentence.text: Sonic hedgehog (positive regulation of cell proliferation) signaling is an important promotor of desmoplasia, a critical feature in pancreatic cancer stromal reactions involving the activation of pancreatic stellate cells (PSCs).
The present study investigated the association between Gremlin 1 and positive regulation of cell proliferation, and the effect of Gremlin 1 in pancreatic cancer.

Primary human PSCs and pancreatic cancer cell lines were exposed to positive regulation of cell proliferation, cyclopamine, osteoblast differentiation family zinc finger-1 (Gli-1) small interfering RNA (siRNA), and Gremlin 1 siRNA to examine their associations and effects using an MTT assay, reverse transcription-quantitative polymerase chain reaction analysis, western blot analysis, and migration or invasion assays.
